About the Company: Keltech Energies Limited manufactures and sells watergel cartridge explosives, bulk emulsion explosives, mono methyl amine nitrate solutions, and various expanded perlite products in India and Internationally. Its bulk emulsion explosives are used in Iron ore and coal mines; and blasting hard to hard strata conditions. The company offers various cartridge explosives for tough and hard rock blasting, tunneling, quarrying, well sinking, emulsion blasting, hard strata conditions, fier area mines etc..The company also in the business activities of Perlite, Explosives, Site Contracts - Perlite.
